tool_description: Calibrates resistance measurement functions using precision resistance standards, testing both 2-wire and 4-wire measurement modes across all resistance ranges.

contact_check.description: Whether to perform contact resistance check

error_messages: Resistance standard not available: Required precision resistance value not available in standard set.
Contact resistance too high: Lead resistance affects 2-wire measurements beyond acceptable limits.
Test current out of spec: DUT test current deviates from specified value affecting accuracy.
Thermal EMF detected: Thermoelectric voltages affecting low resistance measurements.
Measurement instability: Resistance readings showing excessive variation or drift.
Range switching malfunction: DUT resistance ranging not functioning properly.
Invalid measurement mode: Measurement mode must be either '2-wire' or '4-wire'.
Insufficient test values: Minimum 4 test values required per resistance range.
usage: Select resistance ranges and test values to calibrate. Choose measurement mode and optionally specify test current. Tool connects precision resistors and evaluates measurement accuracy.

resistance_errors.description: Measurement errors for each resistance test point

two_wire_four_wire_difference.description: Difference between 2-wire and 4-wire measurements where applicable
